tool.name: Stanford Named Entity Recognizer
tool.help:
**What it does**
Adds named entity annotations to text in a LIF container using the `Stanford Core NLP tools <https://stanfordnlp.github.io/CoreNLP/>`_.
**Required annotations**
* None
**Generated Annotations**
* A LIF document with a single view containing `NamedEntity <http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/NamedEntity.html>`_ annotations, with the entity type (e.g., Person, Location) as the value of the *category* feature.
**License**
Stanford CoreNLP is licensed under `the GNU General Public License <https://stanfordnlp.github.io/CoreNLP/#license>`_.
